execution_plan.description: Retrieve all distinct customer_ids that have placed orders from the Orders table in the orders_db.
Select first name, middle initial and last name of customers from users_db whose customer_id is NOT in the set of customer_ids that have orders (anti-join).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_first_name, customer_middle_initial, customer_last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id NOT IN ($step1.customer_id);
